程序包 src.test.Category_story6_7

类 AddControllerTest

java.lang.Object
src.test.Category_story6_7.AddControllerTest
class AddControllerTest extends Object
Test class for verifying the functionality of the AddController class. This class uses the JUnit testing framework to perform unit tests on methods within the AddController class. It primarily tests the getNextId method and logic related to adding transactions.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • AddControllerTest

      AddControllerTest()

  • 方法详细资料

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp() throws IOException
      Initializes the test environment before each test method is executed. This includes setting the current user, initializing the AddController instance, and creating a test CSV file.
      抛出:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while creating or writing to the CSV file.

    • testGetNextId

      @Test void testGetNextId() throws Exception
      Tests the getNextId method of the AddController class. Uses reflection to call the private getNextId method and verifies that the returned ID is correct.
      抛出:
      Exception - If reflection invocation or assertion fails.

    • testAddTransaction

      @Test void testAddTransaction() throws Exception
      Tests the functionality of adding a transaction. Currently, this test method only calls the getNextId method. The actual test logic for adding transactions needs to be implemented.
      抛出:
      Exception - If reflection invocation or assertion fails.

    • testIsAdded

      @Test void testIsAdded() throws Exception
      Tests whether a transaction has been added. Currently, this test method only calls the getNextId method. The actual test logic for verifying added transactions needs to be implemented.
      抛出:
      Exception - If reflection invocation or assertion fails.

    • setFieldValue

      private void setFieldValue(Object target, String fieldName, Object value) throws NoSuchFieldException, IllegalAccessException
      Helper method to set the value of a field in a target object using reflection.
      参数:
      target - The target object.
      fieldName - The name of the field.
      value - The value to be set.
      抛出:
      NoSuchFieldException - If the specified field does not exist in the target object.
      IllegalAccessException - If the field is not accessible.
